summary: An Ordinance authorizing and directing the Mayor and City Comptroller to draw, and the City Treasurer to pay, warrants in the sum of Twelve Dollars ($12.00) each in favor of A. J. C. Wigmore, owner Lot Twelve (12) Block One (1) C. P. Stone's extension to Edgewater Addition, and in favor of L. C. Knowles, owner of Lot Four (4) Block Eight (8) of C. P. Stone's extension to Edgewater Addition, and appropriating money therefor from Local Improvement Fund District No. 1059.
